data.text: @BethanHandyside So it would appear he had to get out of this otherwise he would of been under a ban.

@BethanHandyside In an article this morning .. "Colette Hollies, a legal assistant at Bentley said: 'I did recognise the number plate on that notice because we had one the previous week for the same vehicle."  - She also said is was the same driver. ...
@BethanHandyside Would you?  It cost more for the lawyer. So he's either arrogant or he has so many points he can't get anymore. Either way he comes out looking like a chump.
